query:
SELECT rl.id, rl.gestorId, rl.lojaId, l.nome
FROM relatorios_livres rl
LEFT JOIN gestores g ON rl.gestorId = g.id
LEFT JOIN lojas l ON rl.lojaId = l.id
WHERE g.id IS NULL
AND rl.lojaId IN (
  SELECT gl.lojaId FROM gestor_lojas gl 
  INNER JOIN gestores g2 ON gl.gestorId = g2.id
  INNER JOIN users u ON g2.userId = u.id
  WHERE u.name LIKE '%Fábio%' OR u.name LIKE '%Fabio%'
);

FROM relatorios_livres rl
LEFT JOIN gestores g ON rl.gestorId = g.id
LEFT JOIN lojas l ON rl.lojaId = l.id
WHERE g.id IS NULL
AND rl.lojaId IN (
  SELECT gl.lojaId FROM gestor_lojas gl 
  INNER JOIN gestores g2 ON gl.gestorId = g2.id
  INNER JOIN users u ON g2.userId = u.id
